title: Was not excessive in swirling water in the mouth while fasting, is Ghusl valid? Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: abdullah from canada my question is uh when i mean while fasting uh while washing the mouth i wasn't excessive and i didn't swirl the water inside my mouth so it's my uh russell valley so you did put water in your mouth yeah i put water in my mouth and i spit it back out but since i was fasting i wasn't excessive i didn't swirl it inside and uh to the right and to the left it is valid inshallah
